OpenProject 11.0.4

We released OpenProject 11.0.4. The release contains several bug fixes and we recommend updating to the newest version.

Bug fixes and changes

  • Fixed: Budgets Fail to Copy due to Missing Superclass Method [#34966]
  • Fixed: Selected design / theme lost when switching to “Backlogs” module [#34968]
  • Fixed: Initially seeded homepage grid cannot be edited [#35266]
  • Fixed: [Translation][German] Administration>User&Permissions>Roles [#35363]
  • Fixed: Internal error (500) on meeting history page when clicking on previous version link [#35433]

Contributions

A big thanks to community members for reporting bugs and helping us identifying and providing fixes.

Special thanks for reporting and finding bugs go to

Boris Lukashev, Benjamin Bädorf, Frank Schmid
